name: Kristen Valent - Life On The Farm

metadata.name: Resting in Stillness
metadata.description:
The 109-year-old farm is a symbol of strength despite the passing of time, nestled in a valley between the mountains. Its paint is faded but still vibrant like a ray of sunshine against the stark white snow.


The barn stands as a sentinel, a guardian of the land. Its doors are closed against the frigid wind, while animals huddle together for warmth with their breath visible in the air. Despite the cold, a feeling of nostalgia and hope for the future dances around you with the spirit of the animals.


This snow-covered landscape is a winter wonderland, a place of beauty and serenity that brings peace to one's soul. The farm is old but full of life and love. It is perseverance and the desire to help feed the world that keeps it running through the hearts and hands of men working tirelessly no matter what the temperatures may be. It has withstood the test of time, a true testament to the enduring strength of the human spirit that should never be forgotten.
